document_data.name: Rhaekbog
document_data.mainbody: '''Rhaekbog''' was a [[goblin]] raider member of the [[Legion of the Chimera]] in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Rhaekbog was a trained goblin warrior, proficient in wearing [[armor]] and wielding [[shield]]s, and used an [[axe]] in combat.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, the town of [[Targos]] in [[Icewind Dale]] became besieged by the Legion of the Chimera. One of the Legion's surprise attacks involved teleporting goblins from underground tunnels into the Targos docks. A group of goblin sappers made it into the basement of one of the warehouses in the docks with the aid of an insider—a [[Luskan]]ite [[mage]] named [[Phaen of the Rags]]. When Phaen's treachery was uncovered, the wizard transported a group of goblins to attack adventuring defenders of Targos. Rhaekbog was among the goblins that came to the wizard's aid and died in the process.
